data.name: Campus Notes - forget me not. OST
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for Campus Notes - forget me not. on Steam. Featuring 26 original tracks (mp3)!

Track-list:

01 forget me not (vo. メルティー)
02 NO MATTER who you are
03 おはようMonring Call fmn-ver.
04 What's going on fmn-ver.
05 Call and Response
06 Sounds Good fmn-ver.
07 Campus Map fmn-ver.
08 Unrest fmn-ver.
09 不安の種 fmn-ver.
10 イナゴEater
11 Empty
12 Who are you
13 神様のとおりみち
14 ノアとアルビノ
15 謎のアプリ
16 植物園
17 Turning Point
18 Orange swallow
19 Violet garden
20 Minty tender
21 こいのうた
22 真実をこの目で
23 ちゅー(吸血音)
24 Nobody Knows
25 Climax
26 Last of all

data.short_description: The original soundtrack for Campus Notes - forget me not. on Steam! Featuring 26 original tracks!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
